remarks.para: The DataDetailDialog form is designed to dynamically create a Detail Dialog to allow display and edit of Data Record values which are contained in the LJCRecord (DbColumns) collection.
The Dialog contains one or more TabControl pages. Each TabPage can consist of multiple ControlColumn objects. Each ControlColumn object can consist of multiple ControlRow objects.

CreateControlRow.summary: Creates the ControlRow and associated controls.
CreateControlRow.remarks: This method creates and positions the controls for a ControlRow. It creates a ControlRow definition and adds it to the private mControlRows collection.

SearchControls.summary: Returns a reference to a Control by name.

SearchLabel.summary: Returns a reference to a Label control by name.

SearchTextBox.summary: Return a reference to a TextBox control by name.

LJCConfigRows.remarks: This is the layout configuration object. It defines how the controls are positioned and is used to populate the ControlColumns and ControlRows layout definition objects.

LJCDataColumns.summary: Gets a reference to the record object.
LJCDataColumns.remarks: This is the main data definition object. This data is used to populate the ControlColumns and ControlRows layout definition objects.

LJCKeyItems.summary: Gets or sets the ControlItems collection.
LJCKeyItems.remarks: Contains the StaticCombo, SelectList and StaticKey reference items.
